name: INSTAGRAM__GET_MEDIA
description: Get Instagram media posts from an Instagram Business Account

fields.description: Comma-separated list of fields to return

limit.description: Number of media items to return

name: INSTAGRAM__CREATE_MEDIA_CONTAINER
description: Create Instagram media container for publishing (first step of 2-step publishing process)

name: INSTAGRAM__PUBLISH_MEDIA
description: Publish a created media container to Instagram feed (second step of 2-step publishing process)

name: INSTAGRAM__GET_MEDIA_DETAILS
description: Get detailed information about a specific Instagram media object

name: INSTAGRAM__DELETE_MEDIA
description: Delete a media post from your Instagram business account.

name: INSTAGRAM__GET_COMMENTS
description: Get comments on an Instagram media object

fields.description: Fields to include for each comment

name: INSTAGRAM__REPLY_TO_COMMENT
description: Reply to an Instagram comment using the Instagram Graph API with your business account.

comment_id.description: Instagram comment ID to reply to

name: INSTAGRAM__DELETE_COMMENT
description: Delete a comment from an Instagram post owned by your account.

name: INSTAGRAM__CREATE_STORY
description: Create and publish an Instagram Story

name: INSTAGRAM__GET_ACCOUNT_INFO
description: Get Instagram Business Account information and metadata

fields.description: Fields to include in account information

name: INSTAGRAM__GET_ACCOUNT_INSIGHTS
description: Get Instagram Business Account analytics and insights metrics

name: INSTAGRAM__GET_MEDIA_INSIGHTS
description: Get analytics and insights for a specific Instagram media object

metric.description: Specific metric to retrieve for the post

name: INSTAGRAM__GET_CONVERSATIONS
description: Get Instagram Direct message conversations for a business or creator account.

name: INSTAGRAM__GET_MESSAGES
description: Get messages from an Instagram Direct conversation thread.

fields.description: Fields to include in message data

name: INSTAGRAM__SEND_MESSAGE
description: Send a direct message through Instagram to a user or conversation.

name: INSTAGRAM__GET_PUBLISHING_LIMIT
description: Get the publishing rate limits for your Instagram business account.

name: INSTAGRAM__GET_TAGGED_MEDIA
description: Get media where your Instagram account has been tagged by others.

fields.description: Fields to include for tagged media

name: INSTAGRAM__GET_PRODUCT_CATALOG
description: Get the product catalog linked to your Instagram shopping account.

fields.description: Fields to include for catalog information

name: INSTAGRAM__LIST_CATALOG_PRODUCTS
description: List products from a catalog linked to your Instagram shopping account.

name: INSTAGRAM__CREATE_LIVE_VIDEO
description: Create a live video broadcast on Instagram for your business account.

name: INSTAGRAM__GET_AVAILABLE_CATALOGS
description: Get available product catalogs linked to your Instagram shopping account.

name: INSTAGRAM__GET_MENTIONS
description: Get notifications when your Instagram account is mentioned by others.

fields.description: Fields to include for mentioned media

name: INSTAGRAM__DISCOVER_BUSINESS_ACCOUNT
description: Discover competitor or related business accounts on Instagram.

name: INSTAGRAM__SEARCH_HASHTAGS
description: Search for hashtags on Instagram to discover relevant content topics.

name: INSTAGRAM__GET_HASHTAG_TOP_MEDIA
description: Get top performing posts for a specific Instagram hashtag.

user_id.description: Instagram Business Account ID for context

name: INSTAGRAM__CONFIGURE_WEBHOOKS
description: Configure Instagram webhooks for real-time notifications on account events.

name: INSTAGRAM__GET_CONNECTED_ACCOUNTS
description: Get all Instagram accounts connected to your Meta Business account.

name: INSTAGRAM__UPLOAD_MEDIA
description: Upload photos, videos, or reels to Instagram as a business account.

name: INSTAGRAM__GET_ARCHIVED_STORIES
description: Get archived Instagram stories from your business account history.

name: INSTAGRAM__GET_REELS
description: Get Instagram Reels published by your business account.
